Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Market
public class Market
extends Observable
Market class represents the market. It contains information about the current disposition and the external marble.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Marble[][] disposition  
    private Marble external  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Market()
    Creates a new Market instance with a random disposition.

    • getDisposition

      public Marble[][] getDisposition()
      Returns a copy of the marble disposition.
      Returns:
      a copy of the marble disposition

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew()
      Notifies all the virtual views of the new marble disposition and the new external marble.

    • notifyNew

      public void notifyNew​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Notifies the player's virtual view of the new marble disposition and the new external marble. Used when a player is reconnecting to the game.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname

    • getExternal

      public Marble getExternal()
      Returns the external marble.
      Returns:
      the external marble

    • setDisposition

      public void setDisposition​(MarketSelection selection, int position)
      Updates the market disposition and the external marble.
      Parameters:
      selection - the player's choice (row or column)
      position - the number of the row/column selected by the player

    • setFakeDisposition

      public void setFakeDisposition​(Marble[][] disposition)
      Updates the market disposition with a desired one. Used in unit tests only.
      Parameters:
      disposition - the desired disposition

    • setFakeExternal

      public void setFakeExternal​(Marble marble)
      Updates the external marble with a desired one. Used in unit tests only.
      Parameters:
      marble - the desired external marble
